bill.title: GENIUS Act Guiding and Establishing National Innovation for U.S. Stablecoins Act
bill.description: A bill to provide for the regulation of payment stablecoins, and for other purposes.

history.action: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.
Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 66.
